var.name: recNum
var.description: number of the measure data of the study area

var.name: lowerX
var.description: the lower limit of the parameter

var.name: upperX
var.description: the upper limit of the parameter

var.name: Xi
var.description: the current parameter value in the evolution

var.name: Xj
var.description: the parameter value in the evolution

var.name: Obji
var.description: the current object function value of the parameter

var.name: Objj
var.description: the object function value of the evolution parameter

var.name: Temperature
var.description: Temperature value of the sa optimization method

var.name: forcingData
var.description: forcing data of the study area

var.name: runoffData
var.description: measure data of the study area

var.name: evaResult
var.description: the evalution result data of the model

var.name: xajObj
var.description: the object function value of the XinAnJiang model

var.name: simResult
var.description: the simulation result of the model

var.name: countk
var.description: the count number in the optimization process
